name: Throw It to Me: The Game Show
name_original: Throw It to Me: The Game Show
description:
Welcome to Throw It To Me: The Game Show!

In this game, you must throw words containing "it" to the host, and everything else to the audience. Good luck!

CONTROLS

  • [ Left Arrow ] or [ Right Arrow ] key to throw the word left or right
  • [ M ] to return to the menu 

TIPS

  • Use headphones to for best sound fidelity
  • The words will get trickier and the timer will get faster as the game progresses 
  • Compete with your friends and family.  (But please, no wagering.)
  • Post your best score in the comments
  • Concentrate!

CREDITS & ABOUT

This is the ninth Trijam for Team Twosticks.  The theme for Trijam #128 is “Throw it to me”

  • C. Haine (12) did the coding using Scratch.
  • K. Haine (12) designed all artwork in Krita and edited fonts and the splash screen in Pixlr E.
  • P. Haine (>12)  found the sounds from Freesound.org and orangefreesounds.com and edited them in Audacity.  Game music was composed in Logic Pro X.
